column3: Latest;Siem Reap: An British man was found dead at a rented house in Group 3
column12: had been staying at the house for three years. After complaining of chest pain
column13: he was taken to Siem Reap Referral Hospital at 11:45 pm
column14: where he died the next morning of a heart attack.------His remains were  taken to Stung Mean Chey
